review.comment: Bad experience. Stay away , very unprofessional organization! They charged us $400 for cleaning 9 air ducts and I asked them to clean the "coils" inside the unit. Typically, it is understood that " coils" means evaporator coils. They charged $75 ($75 was included within the $400 price) to clean the condenser coils, which are totally different copper rings that probabably took them a few minutes to wipe down and I could have done that myself. The techs were very unprofessional also, not introducing themselves properly with a smile and positive attitude when walking in our home; instead the tech just walked in and mumbled some things without addressing either myself or my fiance directly. One of the 2 techs sat in the van most of the time. We asked to speak to the manager concerning the charge of $75 for the miscommunication of the coil cleaning and the tech got in his van, closed the door and called out to me from his van window when addressing matter. The supervisor was on the phone and when addressing the coil cleaning, the supervisor explained that they are not an HVAC company and then they refused to clean the evaporator coils. The website clearly states that they ARE an HVAC organization, which futher proves their unprofessionalism ( I will provide a picture of their website). The tech asked for the $400 and we did pay the amount. The techs did clean the 9 vents. Everything took about an hour. We called the company number and spoke with Bless. Bless understand our concerns and explained that the matter would be investigated. She said she would call us back or email us back with an investigation. We never heard from her again. Unprofessional and no integrity. Please stay away from this organization!
Updated: They stood by what they said and took care of all of my air vents and sanitized. Now my family and I can breathe easier thanks to Green Air Duct Cleaning.

review.comment: I hired this so called company to have the ducts in one of my properties cleaned. First they had to switch times because they said a driver was sick with Covid. Maybe if you required a vaccine mandate the odds of a driver getting Covid would be highly reduced? IDK...call me crazy. So instead of 12 PM the time was moved to 8 AM. I specifically told the office manager don't move the appointment to a different time if they can't show. He promised me they would be at the house around 8 AM and call me 30 minutes in advance. Next day to my surprise by 10 AM nobody showed so I called and cancelled the service. Time for myself and the tenants was wasted. The same office manager told me they couldn't get a hold of the driver and were sorry for the inconvenience. This is just another business that can't seem to do things properly in the world we live in. If you want the job done right I wouldn't even waste my time with a phone call to this sham of an establishment. Hope this review helps all who read and you will be smart enough to call other operations.
review.review_reply: Sorry Jason for this situation. We will improve our services as soon as possible and thanks for share your valuable feedback.

review.comment: They cancelled 3 times drivers call say can’t make it. Then driver told them I cancelled when they lie to me and said truck broke down customer service . Horrible company will not recommend.
review.review_reply: Sorry sir. We will improve our services.
